problem: 问题20. 设 $s, t, u, v \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right)$, 满足 $s+t+u+v=\pi$, 证明: $\frac{\sqrt{2} \sin s-1}{\cos s}+$
solution: 令 $a=\tan s, b=\tan t, c=\tan u, d=\tan v$, 则 $a, b, c, d \in \mathbf{R}^{+}$, 由 $s+t+u+v=\pi$, 得 $\tan (s+t)+\tan (u+v)=0$. 即 $\frac{a+b}{1-a b}+\frac{c+d}{1-c d}=$ 0 . 两边乘以 $(1-a b)(1-c d)$, 得 $a+b+c+d=a b c+b c d+c d a+d a b$. 推出 $(a+b)(a+c)(a+d)=\left(a^2+1\right)(a+b+c+d)$, 即 $\frac{a^2+1}{a+b}= \frac{(a+c)(a+d)}{a+b+c+d}$. 类似, 得到 $\frac{a^2+1}{a+b}+\frac{b^2+1}{b+c}+\frac{c^2+1}{c+d}+\frac{d^2+1}{d+a}=a+b+c+ d$. 由柯西不等式, 得 $2(a+b+c+d)^2=2(a+b+c+$ d) $\left(\frac{a^2+1}{a+b}+\frac{b^2+1}{b+c}+\frac{c^2+1}{c+d}+\frac{d^2+1}{d+a}\right) \geqslant\left(\sqrt{a^2+1}+\sqrt{b^2+1}+\sqrt{c^2+1}+\right. \left.\sqrt{d^2+1}\right)^2$, 即 $\sqrt{a^2+1}+\sqrt{b^2+1}+\sqrt{c^2+1}+\sqrt{d^2+1} \leqslant \sqrt{2}(a+b+c+ d)$, 等价于 $\frac{1}{\cos s}+\frac{1}{\cos t}+\frac{1}{\cos u}+\frac{1}{\cos v} \leqslant \sqrt{2}\left(\frac{\sin s}{\cos s}+\frac{\sin t}{\cos t}+\frac{\sin u}{\cos u}+\frac{\sin v}{\cos v}\right)$.
